name: Little's Sea Journey
description:
She's all alone. Drifting at sea on a boat. She has to figure out whats going on before her times up.

Movement "W A S D"

Jump "Spacebar"

Next Scene "Q"

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is in very VERY early stages, There is no set goal currently.

Any Feedback would be greatly appreciated, it can be about anything.

I am Currently Working on a Title Menu, Options Menu and loading bar.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There is currently a bug that i am aware of, When loading it presents you with a pink screen. I'm doing my best to solve this.
